unusual_spending_patterns.description: Higher travel expenses in July, including hotel and airline charges
Increased shopping expenses in June, with a large purchase at KMART

insights.description: Travel expenses are the highest category, accounting for 31.31% of total spending
There's a significant increase in spending from June to July, primarily due to travel-related expenses
Groceries and shopping are the second and third highest spending categories, respectively
There's no income recorded in the given transaction data, resulting in a negative net income

recommendations.description: Review travel expenses and look for opportunities to reduce costs, such as booking in advance or using loyalty programs
Consider meal planning and bulk shopping to potentially reduce grocery expenses
Evaluate shopping habits, particularly large purchases like the one at KMART, to identify areas for potential savings
Set up a budget for each spending category to better control expenses
Look into tracking income sources to get a complete picture of financial health
